mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveClassInformationList */ A.CLS_ID AS "classID" , A.CLS_INFO_ID AS "classInfoID" , A.DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , B.DEPT_NM AS "departmentName" , A.CLS_NM AS "className" , A.CLS_DESC AS "classDesc" , A.C_YEAR AS "year" , A.SEMESTER AS "semester" , A.GENR AS "generation" , A.STCD AS "statusCode" , A.FRST_REG_DT AS "firstRegisterDate" , A.FRST_REG_TIME AS "firstRegisterTime" , A.LAST_CHNG_DT AS "lastChangeDate" , A.LAST_CHNG_TIME AS "lastChangeTime" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A JOIN FRST.DEPT_INFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND B.STCD <> '02' WHERE (CLS_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR CLS_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND ('' = #{departmentID} OR A.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}) AND ('' = #{year} OR A.C_YEAR = #{year}) AND ('' = #{generation} OR A.GENR = #{generation}) AND ('' = #{semester} OR A.SEMESTER = #{semester}) AND ('' = #{classID} OR A.CLS_ID = #{classID}) AND A.STCD <> '02' ORDER BY A.STCD , A.DEPT_ID , A.CLS_ID DESC , A.C_YEAR DESC , A.SEMESTER DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT /* RetrieveClassInformationTotalCount */ COUNT(*) AS "totalCount" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A JOIN FRST.DEPT_INFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND B.STCD <> '02' WHERE (CLS_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR CLS_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND ('' = #{departmentID} OR A.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}) AND ('' = #{year} OR A.C_YEAR = #{year}) AND ('' = #{generation} OR A.GENR = #{generation}) AND ('' = #{semester} OR A.SEMESTER = #{semester}) AND ('' = #{classID} OR A.CLS_ID = #{classID}) AND A.STCD <> '02'

SELECT /* RetrieveClassInformationListForDownload */ A.CLS_ID AS "classID" , A.DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , B.DEPT_NM AS "departmentName" , A.CLS_NM AS "className" , A.CLS_DESC AS "classDesc" , C_YEAR AS "year" , GENR AS "generation" , SEMESTER AS "semester" , A.STCD AS "statusCode" , A.FRST_REG_DT AS "firstRegisterDate" , A.FRST_REG_TIME AS "firstRegisterTime" , A.LAST_CHNG_DT AS "lastChangeDate" , A.LAST_CHNG_TIME AS "lastChangeTime" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A JOIN FRST.DEPT_INFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND B.STCD <> '02' WHERE (CLS_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR CLS_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND ('' = #{departmentID} OR A.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}) AND ('' = #{year} OR A.C_YEAR = #{year}) AND ('' = #{generation} OR A.GENR = #{generation}) AND ('' = #{semester} OR A.SEMESTER = #{semester}) AND ('' = #{classID} OR A.CLS_ID = #{classID}) AND A.STCD <> '02' ORDER BY A.STCD , A.DEPT_ID , A.CLS_ID DESC , A.C_YEAR DESC , A.SEMESTER DESC

SELECT /* RetrieveClassInformationStudentList */ A.CLS_ID AS "classID" , A.C_YEAR AS "classYear" , A.SEMESTER AS "semester" , A.GENR AS "generation" , A.CLS_NM AS "className" , A.CLS_DESC AS "classDesc" , B.STD_ID AS "studentID" , C.FRST_NM AS "firstName" , C.LAST_NM AS "lastName" , C.DOB AS "dateOfBirth" , C.GENDER AS "gender" , C.PHONE AS "phoneNumber" , A.STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A RIGHT JOIN FRST.STD_CLS_MAP B ON A.CLS_INFO_ID = B.CLS_INFO_ID AND B.STCD <> '02' LEFT JOIN FRST.USER_INFO C ON B.STD_ID = C.SPEC_ID AND C.STCD <> '02' WHERE A.CLS_INFO_ID = #{classID} ORDER BY (C.FRST_NM, C.LAST_NM)
SELECT /* RetrieveLastClassID */ CLS_ID AS "classID" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A ORDER BY CLS_ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* RetrieveClassInformationDetailByClassInfoID */ CLS_ID AS "classID" , CLS_INFO_ID AS "classInfoID" , C_YEAR AS "year" , SEMESTER AS "semester" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A WHERE CLS_INFO_ID = #{classID} LIMIT 1

SELECT /* RetrieveClassInformationDetail */ A.CLS_ID AS "classID" , A.DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , A.CLS_INFO_ID AS "classInfoID" , A.CLS_NM AS "className" , A.CLS_DESC AS "classDesc" , A.C_YEAR AS "classYear" , A.SEMESTER AS "semester" , A.GENR AS "generation" , A.STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.CLS_INFO A WHERE A.CLS_ID = #{classID} AND A.C_YEAR = #{cyear} AND A.SEMESTER = #{semester}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterClassInformation */ INTO FRST.CLS_INFO ( CLS_ID , C_YEAR , SEMESTER , CLS_INFO_ID , DEPT_ID , CLS_NM , CLS_DESC , STCD , GENR , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{classID} , #{cyear} , #{semester} , #{classInfoID} , #{departmentID} , COALESCE(#{className}, '') , COALESCE(#{classDesc}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{generation}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateClassInformation */ FRST.CLS_INFO SET DEPT_ID = COALESCE(#{departmentID}, DEPT_ID) , CLS_NM = COALESCE(#{className}, CLS_NM) , CLS_DESC = COALESCE(#{classDesc}, CLS_DESC) , C_YEAR = COALESCE(#{cyear}, C_YEAR) , GENR = COALESCE(#{generation}, GENR) , SEMESTER = COALESCE(#{semester}, SEMESTER) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE CLS_ID = #{classID} AND C_YEAR = #{cyear} AND SEMESTER = #{semester}
